description:
HP CoolSense Technology is a feature in some HP notebook PCs that combines hardware, software, and mechanical design to dynamically manage the temperature of a notebook, and help keep you comfortable while using it. This feature is available on supported notebooks that are running a supported operating system.
	
Fixes 
- Provides the updated CoolSense.ini file.
summary: HP CoolSense Technology is a feature in some HP notebook PCs that combines hardware, software, and mechanical design to dynamically manage the temperature of a notebook
author: HP Development Company,  L.P.
